Boston, Seattle, Paris Brightcove - https://brightcove.com/careers

We're hiring Software, DevOps, Systems & Sales Engineers, a Designer and more!

We're a cloud based content platform, running the leading Online Video Platform (the largest number of streams after YouTube) and an emerging mobile app framework. We also just bought Zencoder!

Our team is composed of people who are wicked smart & nice. We're growing fast but everyone can (and does!) make a difference.

Perks: unmetered vacation, health, dental, vision, life, 401k. ample food. friendly people everywhere. humble folks without temptation.

i've been working at Brightcove for 4 years and absolutely love it! Reach out if you have any questions
